headline: Extra Space Storage (EXR) Earnings Transcript
summary: In fact, in the fourth quarter, 16 of our top 20 markets experienced positive year-over-year move-in rates to new customers and sequential improvement in revenue growth, contributing to same-store revenue growth returning to positive 0.4% in the quarter.  Only two of our top 20 markets reached this metric in 2024.  Fourth, we originated $80,000,000 in bridge loans, growing the portfolio to approximately $1,500,000,000 at year end.

headline: Extra Space Storage Q4 Core FFO & Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: EXR tops Q4 FFO and revenue estimates as acquisitions expand its footprint and same-store NOI inches up, but lower occupancy clouds 2026 outlook.
